_description: GAS: gradient quality-based client selection with activation generation.
_note: Shared params (clip_grad, weight_decay, use_sfl_transform, use_torchvision_init, use_full_epochs, g_measure_frequency, g_oracle_mode) are in common.json.
_use_sfl_oracle: true: SFL oracle (full model) for G computation | false: legacy oracle.
_use_resnet_image_style: true: ImageNet-style ResNet stem (7x7 conv + maxpool) | false: CIFAR-style (3x3 conv).
_generate: Enable synthetic activation generation for non-IID balancing.
_v_test: Compute V-value (gradient dissimilarity metric) for client ranking.
_accu_test_frequency: Global accuracy evaluation frequency (every N rounds).
